Name: Steve's Pub - Soda on tap
About the game: It's all about service! Steve's Pub is a bartender simulator game for virtual reality with not too realistic physics and a lot of fun! Enjoy serving your guests with different drinks and earn a lot of money! Start a show to distract your guest before they leave because of serving other guest. We bring you an old arcade game to VR! This game contains highly non-alcoholic soda drinks and funny gameplay which both can be very addictive!
